log.description: The 2021 Filer's Instruction Guide (FIG) has been updated.
log.headline: The 2021 Filer's Instruction Guide (FIG) has been updated.
The 2021 FIG and Supplemental Guide for Quarterly Filers has been released.
log.description: The Bureau released the 2021 Filer's Instruction Guide (FIG) and the Supplemental Guide for Quarterly Filers for 2021.

log.headline: Fixes an issue with the HMDA Filing app where a Quarterly Filing was not automatically being created for new filers, filing for the first time during the 'late' filing window.
log.description: HMDA Filing app gets bugfix for Quarterly Filers 2020

log.headline: 2019 National Loan-Level Dataset released.
log.description: The Bureau released the 2019 National Loan-Level Dataset.

log.headline: 2019 MSA/MD Aggregate and Disclosure Reports released.
log.description: The Bureau released the 2019 MSA/MD Aggregate Reports and Disclosure Reports.

log.headline: HMDA Data Browser adds 2019 data.
log.description: The HMDA Data Browser has been updated to include data for 2019.

log.headline: The 2020 Quarterly Filing dates have been updated.
log.description: The closing date of each 2020 Quarterly Filing period has been updated.

log.headline: Add documentation of Data Browser 2017 variables.
log.description: Provide definitions and descriptions for the 2017 Data Browser values, as well as the difference in data structure compared to 2018.

log.headline: Improved guidance for finding your IRS.
log.description: Improved guidance for finding your Insitutions Register Summary (IRS).

log.headline: Disable download of 2019 Modified LAR with Header.
log.description: Temporarily disabling the download of the 2019 Modified LAR with Header row.

log.headline: The 2019 Modified LAR has been released.
log.description: You can now download the 2019 Modified LAR reports.

log.headline: Fixed broken links in 2018 documentation.
log.description: Fixed broken links in 2018 documentation.

log.headline: Removed the 2017 FFVT Tool.
log.description: Submissions for the 2017 Platform are now closed, we are removing the 2017 File Format Verification Tool (FFVT).

log.headline: 2017 Dynamic National Loan-Level Dataset released.
log.description: The 2017 Dynamic National Loan-Level Dataset was released. Maybe this is just a renaming of the files? Not clear from the ticket.

log.headline: Removed the 2017 LARFT Tool.
log.description: Submissions for the 2017 Platform are now closed, we are removing the 2017 Loan Application Register Formatting Tool (LARFT).

log.headline: Removed homepage links to 2017 Filing platform.
log.description: Submissions for the 2017 Platform are now closed.

log.headline: New LEI filter for the HMDA Data Browser.
log.description: The HMDA Data Browser now supports filtering of datasets by Institution (LEI).

log.headline: Released Filing Deadlines for 2020 Annual and Quarterly periods.
log.description: New documentation pages outlining the 2020 Annual and Quarterly filing deadlines have been released.

log.headline: Provide links for ambiguous documentation references.
log.description: Provides URL links, as opposed to just a text reference, for Panel schema, Panel field definitions, and the 2017 FIG.

log.headline: Dev Notes: Running the HMDA Frontend with HMDA Platform locally.
log.description: Several components of the HMDA Frontend (ex. Filing, Data Browser) require a connection to the HMDA Platform.  We've added documentation about running these apps in a dev environment.

log.headline: HMDA Data Browser correction for 2018 County counts.
log.description: HMDA Data Browser gets corrected the per County counts for 2018.

log.headline: Correction to Rate Spread Calculator results.
log.description: An error in the Mortgage Rate Survey table for 15-Year Fixed Points & Fees (cell E135) resulted in incorrect results for Rate Spread on fixed rate loans with terms of 13 to 22 years and rate set date of 7/20/2020. The issue was corrected in the online calculator and the linked tables.

log.headline: Re-enable download of 2019 Modified LAR with Header.
log.description: Re-enable download of 2019 Modified LAR with Header.

log.headline: Add LARFT Documentation for 2020
log.description: Add 2020 Loan/Application Register Formatting Tool (LARFT) Documentation
